# hash

**Instance Property**

The callback used to compute a hash code for values in a collection. If `NULL`, the collection computes a hash code by converting the pointer value to an integer. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFSetHashCallBack] for a description of this callback.

## Declaration

```swift
var hash: CFSetHashCallBack!
```
title: hash
